entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023
